item.title: Issue #2204 created
item.description:
Method calls: treat as â†’ coercion

I would be happy if we could get rid of usages of treat as. Could we use coercion instead?

(: currently :)
for $map as map(*) in M 
return ($map?N treat as function(*))
  ($map, X, Y, ...)

(: proposed :)
for $map as map(*) in M
let $fn as fn(*) := $map?N
return $fn($map, X, Y, ...)

The error code would change from XPDY0050 to XPTY0004.

Related: QT4CG-134-01 from @michaelhkay
